name: Shruti Phadke
content: HomeSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationShruti PhadkePhD, Information ScienceAbout MeI am an assistant professor at Drexel University College of Computing and Informatics. I am a computational social science researcher interested in understanding the social, information sharing, and group processes in online communities. **Note for prospective students**I will be hiring up to two PhD students for Fall 2025 at Drexel. I am also interested in working with Masters and undergrad students starting Fall 2024. Please reach out with your research interests to know more. Contactshruti.phadke@drexel.eduhttps://www.linkedin.com/in/shruti-phadke/Google SitesReport abuseGoogle SitesReport abuse
